Question: Orbbec Inc CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Orbbec Inc

Gemini 2 XL

- Long-range 3D camera
- Accurate and reliable data in various lighting conditions
- Affordable, wide FOV RGB-D PoE camera
- Easy to set up and operate with the Orbbec SDK
- Ideal for AI-based vision developers and robotic applications
Summary_cn:
奥比中光科技股份有限公司

双子座2 XL

- 远距离3D相机
- 在各种光照条件下提供准确可靠的数据
- 经济实惠、具有广角视场的RGB-D PoE相机
- 使用Orbbec SDK易于设置和操作
- 理想的人工智能视觉开发者和机器人应用场景
